document_data.caption: ''An image of Fort Locke.''
document_data.name: Fort Locke
document_data.mainbody: '''Fort Locke''' was a garrison southern end of the [[Mere of Dead Men]] along the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Geography: Located between [[Highcliff]] and [[West Harbor]], Fort Locke was built as a garrison. It was a point where the patrolls would report for duty.
document_data.Inhabitants: Most of inhabitants of the Fort are [[Greycloak]] soldiers, though the Fort also accepted refugees and those willing to help.
document_data.History: It is the place where the King of Shadows fought his first and second battle. In the first battle, the warriors pushed his forces to [[West Harbor]]. The dead soldiers were buried in a graveyard near the Fort. In the second battle, however, the Fort was destroyed.
